name: Blokky's Great Escape
description:
Help Blokky escape the factory! Timing is everything to solve each puzzle and get him to the exit. 

How to play:

 Blokky has 4 abilities:

  • Move forward 1 block
  • Wait
  • Turn left
  • Turn right

Click a command on the right to add it to Blokky's queue. Each command block has a number on the right that represents at what tick that action will take place. You can move command blocks up, down and remove them from Blokky's queue by selecting the command block and the 

When you are done adding to Blokky's queue, press the play button on the left.

Source: https://github.com/richardperkins/Blokky-s-Great-Escape
